name: Mobile Forces
description: Mobile Forces is a first person shooter game where you battle against the opposing AI team or against your friends over a LAN network.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 95/98 Processor: Intel® Pentium III™ 1 GHz or equivalent Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 32Mb 3D accelerated Video Card DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Windows 9.x compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7/8/10 with latest service packs Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 1.4 GHz or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 32Mb 3D accelerated Video Card with Hardware T&L support DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: 3D Sound Card
